Description: Collective Chicago seeks a volunteer Video Editor to work remotely. Responsibilities include editing videos, color grading, motion graphics, and design. Qualifications include video production skills, experience with editing software, attention to detail, and teamwork. Gain valuable experience and portfolio pieces while supporting our mission. Only required during the summer, 2 hours per week. Great connections and recommendations provided. Join us today!
Essential Skills: 1. Video Production and Video Editing skills, 2. Experience in Video Color Grading and Motion Graphics, 3. Attention to detail and a strong sense of visual storytelling, 4. Ability to work independently and remotely, 5. Basic knowledge of video formats
